divs: sighting detailsi was walking around my apartment complex shortly after 10 pm...not sure of exact time but it was before 10:30 pm on june 29, 2011. i live just off route 981 right near downtown mount pleasant (westmoreland county), pa., south east of pittsburgh about an hour travel time. while outside i was watching the many airplanes moving about in all different directions..some i could see the underbellies of them and the twinkling lights so those ones were either taking off from or landing in pittsburgh. others were higher but still i could tell they were airplanes due to the red and white twinkling lights under the wings. i could distinguish the stars in the sky as well and knew that the north star is the brightest, however, when looking in the southeast segment of the sky i saw two different phenomenons going on: one looked like a supernova star just twinkling away...big bright white flaring spurts of light. while just off the side of it was a steady bright white light just hovering and not really twinkling but in a slow turn and hovering in place. i grabbed my bifocals to zoom in better and discovered it was more triangular when looking through my bifocal readers. i was certain then that it was a ufo. i watched it for at least another 10 minutes and it just stayed put in this location. i did not wait to see if it would zoom off as others have reported seeing in many other reports i've read in the past on this site. i am convinced that whoever they are and where ever they are from they seem to love hovering around southwestern pennsylvania during the month of june\july. i saw a triangular ufo in everson, pa (which is only 7 miles south of mt. pleasant.) this same general months time frame in 2010.
Summary: star like hovering object above line of visible airplanes traveling
